message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early!
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take 80 and we can end this quickly.
A more balanced split, Bob. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take the lion's share this time.
A very modest proposal, Bob. I'm willing to give you most of it, but I need something reasonable.
You're getting close to desperation, Alice. I'll take almost all of it now.
I'm running out of options, Bob. This is my last reasonable offer.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take it all now.
I'm out of options, Bob. Take it all if you want it.
